summary: A group of peaceful space explorers find out a trail of a mysterious plot.
cast: Olga Gromova|Vsevolod Larionov|Yuriy Volyntsev|Vasiliy Livanov|Grigoriy Shpigel|Pyotr Vishnyakov|Vladimir Druzhnikov|Vladimir Kenigson|Yuri Andreyev|E. Krasnobaeva|Igor Yasulovich|Rina Zelyonaya
title: El misterio del tercer planeta
